opts:
select KINDCODE,SUPERCODE,KINDNAME,PYCODE,WBCODE,IFEND,IFUSE,MEMO,USERID,USERNAME,RECDATE,CHOSCODE from LKWZ.DICTWZKIND where CHOSCODE = ?
select KINDCODE,SUPERCODE,KINDNAME,PYCODE,WBCODE,IFEND,IFUSE,MEMO,USERID,USERNAME,RECDATE,CHOSCODE from LKWZ.DICTWZKIND where CHOSCODE=0
select KINDCODE,SUPERCODE,KINDNAME,PYCODE,WBCODE,IFEND,IFUSE,MEMO,USERID,USERNAME,RECDATE,CHOSCODE from LKWZ.DICTWZKIND where CHOSCODE = ? [Condition] order by KINDCODE
select KINDCODE from LKWZ.DICTWZKIND where SUPERCODE = ? order by KINDCODE desc
select KINDCODE FROM LKWZ.DICTWZ WHERE KINDCODE= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select IFUSE FROM LKWZ.DICTWZKIND WHERE KINDCODE= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select USERNAME FROM LKWZ.DICTWZKIND WHERE KINDCODE= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select KINDNAME FROM LKWZ.DICTWZKIND WHERE KINDNAME= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select KINDNAME FROM LKWZ.DICTWZKIND WHERE KINDNAME= ? and CHOSCODE=? and KINDCODE !=?
select SUPERCODE FROM LKWZ.DICTWZKIND WHERE SUPERCODE= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select IFEND FROM LKWZ.DICTWZKIND WHERE KINDCODE= ? and CHOSCODE=?
UPDATE LKWZ.DICTWZKIND SET IFUSE=? WHERE KINDCODE= ? and CHOSCODE=?
UPDATE LKWZ.DICTWZKIND SET IFEND=0 WHERE KINDCODE= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select KINDCODE FROM LKWZ.DICTWZKIND WHERE SUPERCODE= ? and CHOSCODE=?
UPDATE LKWZ.DICTWZKIND SET IFEND=1 WHERE KINDCODE= ? and CHOSCODE=?
UPDATE LKWZ.DICTWZKIND SET IFUSE=? ,KINDNAME=? ,PYCODE=? ,USERNAME=? ,RECDATE=? ,USERID=? ,MEMO=? ,WBCODE=? ,IFEND=? ,SUPERCODE=? ,KINDCODE=? WHERE CHOSCODE = ? and KINDCODE=?
DELETE FROM LKWZ.DICTWZKIND WHERE KINDCODE= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select SUPPLYID,SUPPLYNAME,PYCODE,WBCODE,QYDM,FRDB,UNITPROPERTY,UNITBANK,BANKACCOUNT,ADDRESS,RELMAN,RELPHONE,POST,FAX,JYXKZ,YYZZ,IFFACTORY,IFSUPPLY,IFUSE,MEMO,USERID,USERNAME,RECDATE,CHOSCODE from LKWZ.DICTWZSUPPLY where CHOSCODE=0 or CHOSCODE = ?
select DICID,DICDESC from his.字典表 where DICGRPID =302
UPDATE LKWZ.DICTWZSUPPLY SET SUPPLYNAME=? ,PYCODE=? ,WBCODE=? ,QYDM=? ,FRDB=? ,UNITPROPERTY=? ,UNITBANK=? ,BANKACCOUNT=? ,ADDRESS=? ,RELMAN=? ,RELPHONE=? ,POST=? ,FAX=? ,JYXKZ=?,YYZZ=? ,IFFACTORY=? ,IFSUPPLY=? ,IFUSE=? ,MEMO=? ,USERID=? ,USERNAME=? ,RECDATE=? WHERE CHOSCODE = ? and SUPPLYID= ?
select SUPPLYNAME FROM LKWZ.DICTWZSUPPLY WHERE SUPPLYNAME= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select SUPPLYNAME FROM LKWZ.DICTWZSUPPLY WHERE SUPPLYNAME= ? and CHOSCODE=? and SUPPLYID !=?
select SUPPLYID FROM LKWZ.WZINMAIN WHERE SUPPLYID= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select SUPPLYID FROM LKWZ.WZINDETAIL WHERE SUPPLYID= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select SUPPLYID FROM LKWZ.DICTWZDETAIL WHERE SUPPLYID= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select SUPPLYID FROM LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL WHERE SUPPLYID= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select SUPPLYID FROM LKWZ.DICTWZSUPPLY WHERE SUPPLYID= ? and CHOSCODE=0
DELETE FROM LKWZ.DICTWZSUPPLY WHERE SUPPLYID= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select SUPPLYID,SUPPLYNAME,PYCODE,WBCODE,QYDM,FRDB,UNITPROPERTY,UNITBANK,BANKACCOUNT,ADDRESS,RELMAN,RELPHONE,POST,FAX,JYXKZ,YYZZ,IFFACTORY,IFSUPPLY,IFUSE,MEMO,USERID,USERNAME,RECDATE,CHOSCODE from LKWZ.DICTWZSUPPLY where CHOSCODE = 0 or CHOSCODE=? [Condition] order by SUPPLYID
UPDATE LKWZ.DICTWZSUPPLY SET IFUSE=? WHERE SUPPLYID= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select SUPPLYID,SUPPLYNAME,PYCODE,WBCODE,QYDM,FRDB,UNITPROPERTY,UNITBANK,BANKACCOUNT,ADDRESS,RELMAN,RELPHONE,POST,FAX,JYXKZ,YYZZ,IFFACTORY,IFSUPPLY,IFUSE,MEMO,USERID,USERNAME,RECDATE,CHOSCODE from LKWZ.DICTWZSUPPLY where CHOSCODE=0 or CHOSCODE = ? and IFFACTORY=? and IFSUPPLY=?
select a.WZID, a.WZNAME ,a.KINDCODE ,a.COUNTCODE ,a.UNITCODE ,a.LSUNITCODE ,a.PRICE ,a.CHANGERATE,a.LOWNUM ,a.HIGHNUM ,a.RATE ,a.IFNY ,a.IFUSE ,a.USERID,a.USERNAME ,a.RECDATE ,a.FARECODE ,a.PYCODE ,a.WBCODE ,a.SHORTNAME ,a.SHORTCODE ,a.ALIASNAME,a.ALIASCODE,a.GG ,a.VALIDE,a.TXM ,a.MEMO,a.CHOSCODE,b.KINDNAME FROM LKWZ.DICTWZ a left join LKWZ.DICTWZKIND b on a.KINDCODE=b.KINDCODE WHERE a.KINDCODE=? and b.CHOSCODE = ?
select a.WZID, a.WZNAME ,a.KINDCODE ,a.COUNTCODE ,a.UNITCODE ,a.LSUNITCODE ,a.PRICE ,a.CHANGERATE,a.LOWNUM ,a.HIGHNUM ,a.RATE ,a.IFNY ,a.IFUSE ,a.USERID,a.USERNAME ,a.RECDATE ,a.FARECODE ,a.PYCODE ,a.WBCODE ,a.SHORTNAME ,a.SHORTCODE ,a.ALIASNAME,a.ALIASCODE,a.GG ,a.VALIDE,a.TXM ,a.MEMO,a.CHOSCODE,b.KINDNAME FROM LKWZ.DICTWZ a left join LKWZ.DICTWZKIND b on a.KINDCODE=b.KINDCODE WHERE a.KINDCODE = ? and b.CHOSCODE = ?
select a.WZID, a.WZNAME ,a.KINDCODE ,a.COUNTCODE ,a.UNITCODE ,a.LSUNITCODE ,a.PRICE ,a.CHANGERATE,a.LOWNUM ,a.HIGHNUM ,a.RATE ,a.IFNY ,a.IFUSE ,a.USERID,a.USERNAME ,a.RECDATE ,a.FARECODE ,a.PYCODE ,a.WBCODE ,a.SHORTNAME ,a.SHORTCODE ,a.ALIASNAME,a.ALIASCODE,a.GG ,a.VALIDE,a.TXM ,a.MEMO,a.CHOSCODE,b.KINDNAME FROM LKWZ.DICTWZ a left join LKWZ.DICTWZKIND b on a.KINDCODE=b.KINDCODE WHERE b.CHOSCODE = ? [Condition] order by a.WZID
select DICID,DICDESC from his.字典表 where DICGRPID =302
select KindCode,KINDNAME from LKWZ.DiCTWZKIND where IFEND=1 and CHOSCODE=?
select COUNTCODE,COUNTNAME from LKWZ.DICTWZCOUNTKIND where CHOSCODE=?
select DICID,DICDESC from his.字典表 where DICGRPID =301
select DICID,DICDESC from his.字典表 where DICGRPID =301
select 项目编码,项目名称,拼音码 from his.项目表 where (项目编码 like ? or 项目名称 like ? or 拼音码 like ? ) and CHOSCODE = ?
select 项目编码 from his.项目表 where 项目编码= ? and CHOSCODE = ?
UPDATE LKWZ.DICTWZ SET WZNAME=? ,KINDCODE=? ,COUNTCODE=? ,UNITCODE=? ,LSUNITCODE=? ,PRICE=? ,CHANGERATE=? ,LOWNUM=? ,HIGHNUM=? ,RATE=? ,IFNY=? ,IFUSE=? ,USERID=?,USERNAME=? ,RECDATE=? ,FARECODE=? ,PYCODE=? ,WBCODE=? ,SHORTNAME=? ,SHORTCODE=? ,ALIASNAME=?,ALIASCODE=? ,GG=? ,VALIDE=? ,TXM=? ,MEMO=?,CHOSCODE = ? WHERE CHOSCODE = ? and WZID= ?
select WZNAME FROM LKWZ.DICTWZ WHERE WZNAME= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select WZNAME FROM LKWZ.DICTWZ WHERE WZNAME= ? and CHOSCODE=? and WZID !=?
DELETE FROM LKWZ.DICTWZ WHERE WZID= ? and CHOSCODE=?
DELETE FROM LKWZ.DICTWZDETAIL WHERE WZID= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select WZID FROM LKWZ.WZINDETAIL WHERE WZID= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select WZID FROM LKWZ.WZOUTDETAIL WHERE WZID= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select WZID FROM LKWZ.WZPDDETAIL WHERE WZID= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select WZID FROM LKWZ.WZPLANDETAIL WHERE WZID= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select WZID FROM LKWZ.WZSTOCK WHERE WZID= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select WZID FROM LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL WHERE WZID= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select WZID FROM LKWZ.WZTJDETAIL WHERE WZID= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select WZID FROM LKWZ.WZUSEREC WHERE WZID= ? and CHOSCODE=?
UPDATE LKWZ.DICTWZ SET IFUSE=? WHERE WZID= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select a.WZID, a.WZNAME ,a.KINDCODE ,a.COUNTCODE ,a.UNITCODE ,a.LSUNITCODE ,a.PRICE ,a.CHANGERATE,a.LOWNUM ,a.HIGHNUM ,a.RATE ,a.IFNY ,a.IFUSE ,a.USERID,a.USERNAME ,a.RECDATE ,a.FARECODE ,a.PYCODE ,a.WBCODE ,a.SHORTNAME ,a.SHORTCODE ,a.ALIASNAME,a.ALIASCODE,a.GG ,a.VALIDE,a.TXM ,a.MEMO,a.CHOSCODE,b.KINDNAME FROM LKWZ.DICTWZ a left join LKWZ.DICTWZKIND b on a.KINDCODE=b.KINDCODE WHERE a.KINDCODE like ? and b.CHOSCODE = ?
UPDATE LKWZ.DICTWZDETAIL SET SUPPLYID=? ,SUPPLYNAME=? ,IFFACTORY=? ,IFSUPPLY=? WHERE CHOSCODE = ? and WZID= ?
select WZID, SUPPLYID ,SUPPLYNAME ,IFFACTORY ,IFSUPPLY ,CHOSCODE FROM LKWZ.DICTWZDETAIL WHERE WZID=? and CHOSCODE = ?
select SUPPLYID,SUPPLYID from LKWZ.DICTWZSUPPLY where CHOSCODE =?
select IFFACTORY from LKWZ.DICTWZSUPPLY where CHOSCODE =? and SUPPLYID=?
select SUPPLYNAME from LKWZ.DICTWZSUPPLY where CHOSCODE =? and SUPPLYID=?
select IFSUPPLY from LKWZ.DICTWZSUPPLY where CHOSCODE =? and SUPPLYID=?
DELETE FROM LKWZ.DICTWZDETAIL WHERE WZID= ? and CHOSCODE=?
select SUPPLYID,SUPPLYNAME,PYCODE,WBCODE,CHOSCODE from LKWZ.DICTWZSUPPLY where (SUPPLYID like ? or SUPPLYNAME like ? or PYCODE like ? or WBCODE like ?) and ( CHOSCODE=? or CHOSCODE=0)
select SUPPLYID from LKWZ.DICTWZSUPPLY where SUPPLYID = ? and ( CHOSCODE=? or CHOSCODE=0)
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>-->
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>-->
select WARECODE,WARENAME from LKWZ.DICTWZWARE where CHOSCODE=?
UPDATE LKWZ.WZPDMAIN SET WARECODE=? ,MEMO=? ,USERID=? ,USERNAME=? WHERE CHOSCODE = ? and PDID= ?
select PDID, WARECODE ,PDDATE ,STATUS ,MEMO ,USERID ,USERNAME ,RECDATE,SHDATE ,SHUSERID ,SHUSERNAME ,JZDATE ,JZUSERID ,JZUSERNAME,CHOSCODE ,INID ,OUTID FROM LKWZ.WZPDMAIN WHERE CHOSCODE = ? order by PDID desc
UPDATE LKWZ.WZPDMAIN SET STATUS=0 WHERE PDID= ? and CHOSCODE=?
DELETE FROM LKWZ.WZPDDETAIL WHERE PDID= ? and STOCKFLOWNO=? and CHOSCODE=?
select YKNUM from LKWZ.WZPDDETAIL where PDID=? and WZID=? and CHOSCODE=?
select PDID from LKWZ.WZPDDETAIL where PDID=? and CHOSCODE=?
select a.FLOWNO, a.WZID,a.INID,b.WZNAME,a.WARECODE,a.STOCKID,a.BEFORENUM,a.LSUNITCODE, a.CHANGERATE,a.OUTNUM,a.PRICE,a.LSPRICE,a.PH,a.PZWH,a.NUM, a.SUPPLYID,a.SUPPLYNAME,a.PRODUCTDATE,a.VALIDDATE,a.WSXKZH,a.MEMO,a.TXM,a.RECIPECODE, a.SHDH,a.SUPPLYID2,a.SUPPLYNAME2,a.INDATE,a.CHOSCODE,d.WARENAME from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL a left join LKWZ.DICTWZ b on a.WZID=b.WZID left join LKWZ.WZSTOCK c on a.STOCKID=c.STOCKID left join LKWZ.DICTWZWARE d on a.WARECODE=d.WARECODE where a.FLOWNO=? and a.CHOSCODE=?
select a.FLOWNO, a.WZID,a.INID,b.WZNAME,a.WARECODE,a.STOCKID,a.BEFORENUM,a.LSUNITCODE, a.CHANGERATE,a.OUTNUM,a.PRICE,a.LSPRICE,a.PH,a.PZWH,a.NUM, a.SUPPLYID,a.SUPPLYNAME,a.PRODUCTDATE,a.VALIDDATE,a.WSXKZH,a.MEMO,a.TXM,a.RECIPECODE, a.SHDH,a.SUPPLYID2,a.SUPPLYNAME2,a.INDATE,a.CHOSCODE,d.WARENAME,e.FACTNUM,e.YKNUM from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL a left join LKWZ.DICTWZ b on a.WZID=b.WZID left join LKWZ.DICTWZWARE d on a.WARECODE=d.WARECODE left join LKWZ.WZPDDETAIL e on (a.FLOWNO= e.STOCKFLOWNO and e.PDID=?) where a.FLOWNO in ( select FLOWNO from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL a left join LKWZ.WZPDDETAIL e on (a.FLOWNO= e.STOCKFLOWNO and e.PDID=?) where e.YKNUM is not null and a.CHOSCODE=? and a.WARECODE=?)
select a.FLOWNO, a.WZID,a.INID,b.WZNAME,a.WARECODE,a.STOCKID,a.BEFORENUM,a.LSUNITCODE, a.CHANGERATE,a.OUTNUM,a.PRICE,a.LSPRICE,a.PH,a.PZWH,a.NUM, a.SUPPLYID,a.SUPPLYNAME,a.PRODUCTDATE,a.VALIDDATE,a.WSXKZH,a.MEMO,a.TXM,a.RECIPECODE, a.SHDH,a.SUPPLYID2,a.SUPPLYNAME2,a.INDATE,a.CHOSCODE,d.WARENAME from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL a left join LKWZ.DICTWZ b on a.WZID=b.WZID left join LKWZ.DICTWZWARE d on a.WARECODE=d.WARECODE where a.FLOWNO in ( select Max(a.flowno) from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL a where a.WARECODE=? and a.CHOSCODE=? group by a.WZID) [Condition] order by a.FLOWNO desc
select a.FLOWNO, a.WZID,a.INID,b.WZNAME,a.WARECODE,a.STOCKID,a.BEFORENUM,a.LSUNITCODE, a.CHANGERATE,a.OUTNUM,a.PRICE,a.LSPRICE,a.PH,a.PZWH,a.NUM, a.SUPPLYID,a.SUPPLYNAME,a.PRODUCTDATE,a.VALIDDATE,a.WSXKZH,a.MEMO,a.TXM,a.RECIPECODE, a.SHDH,a.SUPPLYID2,a.SUPPLYNAME2,a.INDATE,a.CHOSCODE,d.WARENAME,e.FACTNUM,e.YKNUM from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL a left join LKWZ.DICTWZ b on a.WZID=b.WZID left join LKWZ.DICTWZWARE d on a.WARECODE=d.WARECODE left join LKWZ.WZPDDETAIL e on (a.FLOWNO= e.STOCKFLOWNO and e.PDID=?)
where ( a.FLOWNO in ( select Max(a.flowno) from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL a where a.CHOSCODE=? and a.WARECODE=? and a.WZID not in ( select a.WZID from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL a left join LKWZ.WZPDDETAIL e on (a.FLOWNO= e.STOCKFLOWNO and e.PDID=?) where e.YKNUM is not null) group by a.WZID) or a.FLOWNO in ( select a.FLOWNO from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL a left join LKWZ.WZPDDETAIL e on (a.FLOWNO= e.STOCKFLOWNO and e.PDID=?) where e.YKNUM is not null and a.CHOSCODE=? and a.WARECODE=?))
[Condition] order by a.FLOWNO desc
select PDID FROM LKWZ.WZPDDETAIL WHERE PDID=? and STOCKFLOWNO=? and CHOSCODE = ?
select PDID, WARECODE ,PDDATE ,STATUS ,MEMO ,USERID ,USERNAME ,RECDATE,SHDATE ,SHUSERID ,SHUSERNAME ,JZDATE ,JZUSERID ,JZUSERNAME,CHOSCODE ,INID ,OUTID FROM LKWZ.WZPDMAIN WHERE CHOSCODE = ? [Condition] order by PDID desc
select PDID, STOCKFLOWNO ,STOCKID ,WZID ,STOCKNUM ,FACTNUM ,YKNUM ,LSUNITCODE,PRICE ,LSPRICE ,PH ,PZWH ,SUPPLYID ,SUPPLYNAME,PRODUCTDATE ,VALIDDATE ,WSXKZH,INDATE,MEMO,TXM,RECIPECODE,SHDH,SUPPLYID2,SUPPLYNAME2,CHOSCODE,INDETAILNO,OUTDETAILNO FROM LKWZ.WZPDDETAIL WHERE PDID=? and CHOSCODE = ? order by STOCKFLOWNO desc
UPDATE LKWZ.WZPDMAIN SET STATUS=? ,SHUSERID=? ,SHUSERNAME=? ,SHDATE=? WHERE CHOSCODE = ? and PDID= ?
UPDATE LKWZ.WZPDDETAIL SET FACTNUM=? ,YKNUM=? WHERE CHOSCODE = ? and PDID= ? and STOCKFLOWNO=?
UPDATE LKWZ.WZPDMAIN SET STATUS=? ,SHUSERID=? ,SHUSERNAME=? ,SHDATE=? WHERE CHOSCODE = ? and PDID= ?
UPDATE LKWZ.WZPDMAIN SET STATUS=? ,JZUSERID=? ,JZUSERNAME=? ,JZDATE=? WHERE CHOSCODE = ? and PDID= ?
UPDATE LKWZ.WZPDDETAIL SET INDETAILNO=? WHERE STOCKFLOWNO=? and CHOSCODE = ? and PDID= ?
UPDATE LKWZ.WZPDDETAIL SET OUTDETAILNO=? WHERE STOCKFLOWNO=? and CHOSCODE = ? and PDID= ?
UPDATE LKWZ.WZPDMAIN SET INID=? WHERE CHOSCODE = ? and PDID= ?
UPDATE LKWZ.WZPDMAIN SET OUTID=? WHERE CHOSCODE = ? and PDID= ?
select STOCKFLOWNO,LSUNITCODE,PRICE FROM LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL WHERE PDID=? and CHOSCODE = ? order by STOCKFLOWNO desc
select SYSVALUE FROM his.系统参数 WHERE ID=2105
select PDID, STOCKFLOWNO ,STOCKID ,WZID ,STOCKNUM ,FACTNUM ,YKNUM ,LSUNITCODE,PRICE ,LSPRICE ,PH ,PZWH ,SUPPLYID ,SUPPLYNAME,PRODUCTDATE ,VALIDDATE ,WSXKZH,INDATE,MEMO,TXM,RECIPECODE,SHDH,SUPPLYID2,SUPPLYNAME2,CHOSCODE,INDETAILNO,OUTDETAILNO FROM LKWZ.WZPDDETAIL WHERE YKNUM > 0 and PDID=? and CHOSCODE = ? order by STOCKFLOWNO desc
select NUM FROM LKWZ.WZSTOCK WHERE WZID=? and CHOSCODE=? and WARECODE=?
select LSUNITCODE FROM LKWZ.DICTWZ WHERE WZID=?
select CHANGERATE FROM LKWZ.DICTWZ WHERE WZID=?
select STOCKID FROM LKWZ.WZSTOCK WHERE WZID=? and CHOSCODE=? and WARECODE=?
UPDATE LKWZ.WZSTOCK SET NUM=? WHERE CHOSCODE = ? and STOCKID= ?
select SYSVALUE FROM his.系统参数 WHERE ID=2106
select PDID, STOCKFLOWNO ,STOCKID ,WZID ,STOCKNUM ,FACTNUM ,YKNUM ,LSUNITCODE,PRICE ,LSPRICE ,PH ,PZWH ,SUPPLYID ,SUPPLYNAME,PRODUCTDATE ,VALIDDATE ,WSXKZH,INDATE,MEMO,TXM,RECIPECODE,SHDH,SUPPLYID2,SUPPLYNAME2,CHOSCODE,INDETAILNO,OUTDETAILNO FROM LKWZ.WZPDDETAIL WHERE YKNUM < 0 and PDID=? and CHOSCODE = ? order by STOCKFLOWNO desc
select FLOWNO, INID ,WARECODE ,WZID ,STOCKID ,NUM ,BEFORENUM ,LSUNITCODE,CHANGERATE,OUTNUM,PRICE ,LSPRICE ,PH ,PZWH ,SUPPLYID ,SUPPLYNAME,PRODUCTDATE ,VALIDDATE ,WSXKZH,INDATE,MEMO,TXM,RECIPECODE,SHDH,SUPPLYID2,SUPPLYNAME2,CHOSCODE FROM LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL WHERE WARECODE=? and CHOSCODE = ? and STOCKID = ? and WZID = ?
select WARECODE,WARENAME from LKWZ.DICTWZWARE where CHOSCODE =?
select WARECODE,WARENAME from LKWZ.DICTWZWARE where IFRDWARE=1 and CHOSCODE =?
select USENO, STOCKFLOWNO ,STOCKID ,WZID ,WZNAME ,WARECODE ,SICKCODE ,SICKNAME,USENUM ,LSUNITCODE ,USEDATE ,SENDDEPTID ,RECVDEPTID ,PRICE,LSPRICE ,PH ,PZWH,SUPPLYID,SUPPLYNAME ,PRODUCTDATE ,VALIDDATE ,WSXKZH ,INDATE ,MEMO ,TXM ,RECIPECODE ,SHDH ,SUPPLYID2 ,SUPPLYNAME2 ,CHOSCODE ,STATUS ,USERID ,USERNAME ,RECDATE FROM LKWZ.WZUSEREC WHERE CHOSCODE = ? order by USENO desc
select a.FLOWNO,e.USENO, a.WZID,a.INID,b.WZNAME,a.WARECODE,a.STOCKID,a.BEFORENUM,a.LSUNITCODE, a.CHANGERATE,a.OUTNUM,a.PRICE,a.LSPRICE,a.PH,a.PZWH,a.NUM, a.SUPPLYID,a.SUPPLYNAME,a.PRODUCTDATE,a.VALIDDATE,a.WSXKZH,a.MEMO,a.TXM,a.RECIPECODE, a.SHDH,a.SUPPLYID2,a.SUPPLYNAME2,a.INDATE,a.CHOSCODE,d.WARENAME from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL a left join LKWZ.DICTWZ b on a.WZID=b.WZID left join LKWZ.DICTWZWARE d on a.WARECODE=d.WARECODE left join LKWZ.WZUSEREC e on (a.FLOWNO= e.STOCKFLOWNO and e.SICKCODE=? )
where a.FLOWNO in( select STOCKFLOWNO from LKWZ.WZUSEREC where CHOSCODE=? and WARECODE=? ) order by a.FLOWNO desc
select a.FLOWNO, a.WZID,a.INID,b.WZNAME,a.WARECODE,a.STOCKID,a.BEFORENUM,a.LSUNITCODE, a.CHANGERATE,a.OUTNUM,a.PRICE,a.LSPRICE,a.PH,a.PZWH,a.NUM, a.SUPPLYID,a.SUPPLYNAME,a.PRODUCTDATE,a.VALIDDATE,a.WSXKZH,a.MEMO,a.TXM,a.RECIPECODE, a.SHDH,a.SUPPLYID2,a.SUPPLYNAME2,a.INDATE,a.CHOSCODE,d.WARENAME from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL a left join LKWZ.DICTWZ b on a.WZID=b.WZID left join LKWZ.DICTWZWARE d on a.WARECODE=d.WARECODE where a.FLOWNO in ( select Max(a.flowno) from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL a where a.CHOSCODE=? and a.WARECODE=? group by a.WZID) [Condition] order by a.FLOWNO desc
select a.FLOWNO, a.WZID,a.INID,b.WZNAME,a.WARECODE,a.STOCKID,a.BEFORENUM,a.LSUNITCODE, a.CHANGERATE,a.OUTNUM,a.PRICE,a.LSPRICE,a.PH,a.PZWH,a.NUM, a.SUPPLYID,a.SUPPLYNAME,a.PRODUCTDATE,a.VALIDDATE,a.WSXKZH,a.MEMO,a.TXM,a.RECIPECODE, a.SHDH,a.SUPPLYID2,a.SUPPLYNAME2,a.INDATE,a.CHOSCODE,d.WARENAME,e.USENO,e.USENUM,e.SENDDEPTID,e.RECVDEPTID,e.USEDATE,f.名称 as SendName,g.名称 as ReciName from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL a left join LKWZ.DICTWZ b on a.WZID=b.WZID left join LKWZ.DICTWZWARE d on a.WARECODE=d.WARECODE left join LKWZ.WZUSEREC e on (a.FLOWNO= e.STOCKFLOWNO and e.SICKCODE=? and e.STATUS='1' ) left join HIS.科室表 f on f.ID=e.SENDDEPTID left join HIS.科室表 g on g.ID=e.RECVDEPTID
where ( a.FLOWNO in ( select Max(a.flowno) from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL a where a.CHOSCODE=? and a.WARECODE=? and a.WZID not in ( select WZID from LKWZ.WZUSEREC where CHOSCODE=? and WARECODE=? ) group by a.WZID ) or a.FLOWNO in( select STOCKFLOWNO from LKWZ.WZUSEREC where WZID in ( select WZID from LKWZ.WZUSEREC where CHOSCODE=? and WARECODE=?) and CHOSCODE=? and WARECODE=? ) ) order by e.USENO desc
select 名称 as 开单科室 ,ID as 开单科室ID from his.科室表 where (ID like ? or 名称 like ? or 类别 like ? ) and CHOSCODE = ?
select 名称 as 接单科室 ,ID as 接单科室ID from his.科室表 where ( ID like ? or 名称 like ? or 类别 like ? ) and CHOSCODE = ?
select 名称,ID from his.科室表 where ID = ? and CHOSCODE = ?
select 名称,ID from his.科室表 where 名称 = ? and CHOSCODE = ?
select 病人姓名 from his.住院登记表 where CHOSCODE =? and 住院号=?
UPDATE LKWZ.WZUSEREC SET USENUM=?, USEDATE=? WHERE CHOSCODE = ? and USENO= ?
SELECT USENUM from LKWZ.WZUSEREC WHERE CHOSCODE = ? and USENO= ?
select USENO, STOCKFLOWNO ,STOCKID ,WZID ,WZNAME ,WARECODE ,SICKCODE ,SICKNAME,USENUM ,LSUNITCODE ,USEDATE ,SENDDEPTID ,RECVDEPTID ,PRICE,LSPRICE ,PH ,PZWH,SUPPLYID,SUPPLYNAME ,PRODUCTDATE ,VALIDDATE ,WSXKZH ,INDATE ,MEMO ,TXM ,RECIPECODE ,SHDH ,SUPPLYID2 ,SUPPLYNAME2 ,CHOSCODE ,STATUS ,USERID ,USERNAME ,RECDATE FROM LKWZ.WZUSEREC WHERE USENO=? and CHOSCODE = ?
UPDATE LKWZ.WZUSEREC SET STATUS=0 WHERE CHOSCODE = ? and USENO= ?
select USENO, STOCKFLOWNO ,STOCKID ,WZID ,WZNAME ,WARECODE ,SICKCODE ,SICKNAME,USENUM ,LSUNITCODE ,USEDATE ,SENDDEPTID ,RECVDEPTID ,PRICE,LSPRICE ,PH ,PZWH,SUPPLYID,SUPPLYNAME ,PRODUCTDATE ,VALIDDATE ,WSXKZH ,INDATE ,MEMO ,TXM ,RECIPECODE ,SHDH ,SUPPLYID2 ,SUPPLYNAME2 ,CHOSCODE ,STATUS ,USERID ,USERNAME ,RECDATE FROM LKWZ.WZUSEREC WHERE CHOSCODE = ? [Condition] order by USENO desc
UPDATE LKWZ.WZSTOCK set NUM=? where CHOSCODE = ? and STOCKID= ?
SELECT OUTNUM FROM LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL where CHOSCODE = ? and STOCKID= ? order by OUTNUM desc
SELECT OUTNUM FROM LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL where CHOSCODE = ? and WARECODE= ? and WZID=? order by FLOWNO desc
SELECT STOCKFLOWNO FROM LKWZ.WZUSEREC where CHOSCODE = ? and STOCKID= ? order by STOCKFLOWNO desc
SELECT NUM FROM LKWZ.WZSTOCK where CHOSCODE = ? and STOCKID= ?
SELECT SYSVALUE FROM HIS.系统参数 where ID=2103 and CHOSCODE = ?
select NEWPRICE from LKWZ.WZTJDETAIL where TJID=? and WZID=? and CHOSCODE=?
select TJID, WARECODE ,TJDATE ,STATUS ,TJREASON,MEMO,USERID ,USERNAME ,RECDATE,SHDATE ,SHUSERID ,SHUSERNAME ,SHINDATE ,SHINUSERID ,SHINUSERNAME,CHOSCODE FROM LKWZ.WZTJMAIN WHERE CHOSCODE = ? [Condition] order by TJID desc
UPDATE LKWZ.WZTJMAIN SET WARECODE=? ,TJREASON=? ,MEMO=? WHERE CHOSCODE = ? and TJID= ?
UPDATE LKWZ.WZTJMAIN SET STATUS=? WHERE CHOSCODE = ? and TJID= ?
DELETE FROM LKWZ.WZTJDETAIL WHERE TJID= ? and STOCKFLOWNO=? and CHOSCODE=?
UPDATE LKWZ.WZTJMAIN SET STATUS=? ,SHUSERID=? ,SHUSERNAME=? ,SHDATE=? WHERE CHOSCODE = ? and TJID= ?
UPDATE LKWZ.WZTJMAIN SET STATUS=? ,SHUSERID=? ,SHUSERNAME=? ,SHDATE=? WHERE CHOSCODE = ? and TJID= ?
UPDATE LKWZ.WZTJMAIN SET STATUS=? ,SHINUSERID=? ,SHINUSERNAME=? ,SHINDATE=? WHERE CHOSCODE = ? and TJID= ?
select a.FLOWNO, a.WZID,a.INID,b.WZNAME,a.WARECODE,a.STOCKID,a.BEFORENUM,a.LSUNITCODE, a.CHANGERATE,a.OUTNUM,a.PRICE,a.LSPRICE,a.PH,a.PZWH,a.NUM, a.SUPPLYID,a.SUPPLYNAME,a.PRODUCTDATE,a.VALIDDATE,a.WSXKZH,a.MEMO,a.TXM,a.RECIPECODE, a.SHDH,a.SUPPLYID2,a.SUPPLYNAME2,a.INDATE,a.CHOSCODE,d.WARENAME,e.NEWPRICE from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL a left join LKWZ.DICTWZ b on a.WZID=b.WZID left join LKWZ.DICTWZWARE d on a.WARECODE=d.WARECODE left join LKWZ.WZTJDETAIL e on (a.FLOWNO= e.STOCKFLOWNO and e.TJID=?) where a.FLOWNO in( select STOCKFLOWNO from LKWZ.WZTJDETAIL where WZID in ( select WZID from LKWZ.WZTJDETAIL where CHOSCODE=? and WARECODE=?) and CHOSCODE=? and WARECODE=? )
[Condition] order by a.FLOWNO desc
select a.FLOWNO, a.WZID,a.INID,b.WZNAME,a.WARECODE,a.STOCKID,a.BEFORENUM,a.LSUNITCODE, a.CHANGERATE,a.OUTNUM,a.PRICE,a.LSPRICE,a.PH,a.PZWH,a.NUM, a.SUPPLYID,a.SUPPLYNAME,a.PRODUCTDATE,a.VALIDDATE,a.WSXKZH,a.MEMO,a.TXM,a.RECIPECODE, a.SHDH,a.SUPPLYID2,a.SUPPLYNAME2,a.INDATE,a.CHOSCODE,d.WARENAME,e.NEWPRICE from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL a left join LKWZ.DICTWZ b on a.WZID=b.WZID left join LKWZ.DICTWZWARE d on a.WARECODE=d.WARECODE left join LKWZ.WZTJDETAIL e on (a.FLOWNO= e.STOCKFLOWNO and e.TJID=?)
where ( a.FLOWNO in ( select Max(a.flowno) from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL a where a.CHOSCODE=? and a.WARECODE=? and a.WZID not in ( select a.WZID from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL a left join LKWZ.WZTJDETAIL e on (a.FLOWNO= e.STOCKFLOWNO and e.TJID=?) where e.NEWPRICE is not null) group by a.WZID) or a.FLOWNO in( select STOCKFLOWNO from LKWZ.WZTJDETAIL where WZID in ( select WZID from LKWZ.WZTJDETAIL where CHOSCODE=? and WARECODE=?) and CHOSCODE=? and WARECODE=? ) )
[Condition] order by a.FLOWNO desc
select TJID, WARECODE ,TJDATE ,TJREASON,STATUS ,MEMO ,USERID ,USERNAME ,RECDATE,SHDATE ,SHUSERID ,SHUSERNAME ,SHINDATE ,SHINUSERID ,SHINUSERNAME,CHOSCODE FROM LKWZ.WZTJMAIN WHERE CHOSCODE = ? and WARECODE=? order by TJID desc
select TJID, STOCKFLOWNO ,WZID ,STOCKID,NUM ,UNITCODE ,NEWPRICE ,OLDPRICE ,PH,PZWH ,SUPPLYID ,SUPPLYNAME ,PRODUCTDATE ,VALIDDATE ,WSXKZH,MEMO,TXM,INDATE,RECIPECODE,SHDH,SUPPLYID2,SUPPLYNAME2,CHOSCODE FROM LKWZ.WZTJDETAIL WHERE TJID = ? and CHOSCODE=? order by TJID desc
UPDATE LKWZ.WZTJDETAIL SET NEWPRICE=? WHERE STOCKFLOWNO=? and CHOSCODE = ? and TJID= ?
UPDATE LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL SET LSPRICE=? WHERE FLOWNO=? and CHOSCODE = ?
SELECT WZNAME FROM LKWZ.DICTWZ where WZID = ? and CHOSCODE= ?
select KINDNAME,KINDCODE,SUPERCODE,IFUSE from LKWZ.DICTWZKIND where( KINDCODE like ? or KINDNAME like ? ) and CHOSCODE = ?
select WZNAME,WZID,SHORTNAME,ALIASNAME from LKWZ.DICTWZ where (WZID like ? or WZNAME like ? or SHORTNAME like ? or ALIASNAME like ? )and CHOSCODE = ?
select a.FLOWNO,a.WZID,a.INID,b.WZNAME,a.WARECODE,a.STOCKID,a.BEFORENUM,a.LSUNITCODE, a.CHANGERATE,a.OUTNUM,a.PRICE,a.LSPRICE,a.PH,a.PZWH,c.NUM, a.SUPPLYID,a.SUPPLYNAME,a.PRODUCTDATE,a.VALIDDATE,a.WSXKZH,a.MEMO,a.TXM,a.RECIPECODE, a.SHDH,a.SUPPLYID2,a.SUPPLYNAME2,a.INDATE,a.CHOSCODE,d.WARENAME,e.KINDCODE from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL a left join LKWZ.DICTWZ b on a.WZID=b.WZID left join LKWZ.WZSTOCK c on a.WZID=c.WZID left join LKWZ.DICTWZWARE d on c.WARECODE=d.WARECODE left join LKWZ.DICTWZ e on a.WZID=e.WZID where a.WARECODE=? and a.CHOSCODE = ? [Condition] order by a.FLOWNO desc
UPDATE LKWZ.WZSTOCK SET NUMSX=?, NUMXX=? WHERE STOCKID=? and CHOSCODE = ?
select c.STOCKID,c.WARECODE,c.WZID,b.WZNAME,c.FLOWNO,c.INID,c.MEMO,c.BEFORENUM,c.LSUNITCODE,c.CHANGERATE,c.OUTNUM,c.LSPRICE,c.PRICE,c.PH,c.PZWH,c.SUPPLYID,c.SUPPLYNAME,c.PRODUCTDATE,c.VALIDDATE,c.WSXKZH,c.INDATE,c.TXM,c.RECIPECODE,c.SHDH,c.SUPPLYID2,c.SUPPLYNAME2, c.CHOSCODE,c.NUM,d.WARENAME,e.KINDCODE from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL c left join LKWZ.DICTWZ b on c.WZID=b.WZID left join LKWZ.DICTWZWARE d on c.WARECODE=d.WARECODE left join LKWZ.DICTWZ e on c.WZID=e.WZID where c.STOCKID=? and c.CHOSCODE = ? order by c.STOCKID desc
select a.STOCKID, a.WARECODE , a.WZID , a.NUM , a.LSUNITCODE , a.NUMSX , a.NUMXX , a.MEMO, a.CHOSCODE,b.WZNAME FROM LKWZ.WZSTOCK a left join LKWZ.DICTWZ b on a.WZID=b.WZID WHERE a.WARECODE = ? and a.CHOSCODE = ?
select a.STOCKID, a.WARECODE , a.WZID , a.NUM , a.LSUNITCODE , a.NUMSX , a.NUMXX , a.MEMO, a.CHOSCODE,b.WZNAME FROM LKWZ.WZSTOCK a left join LKWZ.DICTWZ b on a.WZID=b.WZID WHERE a.WARECODE = ? and a.CHOSCODE = ? and [Condition]
select c.STOCKID,c.WARECODE,c.WZID,b.WZNAME,c.NUMSX,c.NUMXX,c.MEMO,c.LSUNITCODE, c.CHOSCODE,c.NUM,d.WARENAME,e.KINDCODE from LKWZ.WZSTOCK c left join LKWZ.DICTWZ b on c.WZID=b.WZID left join LKWZ.DICTWZWARE d on c.WARECODE=d.WARECODE left join LKWZ.DICTWZ e on c.WZID=e.WZID where c.WARECODE=? and c.CHOSCODE = ? [Condition] order by c.STOCKID desc
select DICID,DICDESC from 字典表 where Dicgrpid=301
select ID,名称 from 科室表 where CHOSCODE=?
